urls.title: Colthouse beck NFM - SCRT
urls.description: SCRT have just finished another Natural Flood Management (NFM) project at Colthouse beck near Hawkshead. The project, funded by Cumbria County Council is a collaborative project with SCRT as project lead, National Trust as the landowners, contractors Catchment Designs Ltd and the Enviornment Agency. The works that are being carried out include: 1) the de-culverting of the existing stone-walled culvert at the top of the site, 2) the creation of a re-profiled open watercourse channel, 3) the creation of twoâ€¦
